key.name: cache-ttl
key.description: How long a computed folder size should be cached.

key.name: max-workers
key.description: Maximum number of concurrent du processes.

key.name: skip-mountpoints
key.description: Stay on the current filesystem when calculating sizes.

key.name: queue-timeout
key.description: Requeue jobs that have been waiting longer than this.

key.name: rotate-interval
key.description: Interval in seconds for rotating status symbols.

key.name: long-job-threshold
key.description: Seconds after which a running job is considered long-running.

key.name: decimal-places
key.description: Number of decimal places for human-readable sizes.

key.name: binary-units
key.description: Use 1024-based units (KiB, MiB) instead of decimal.

key.name: auto-scan
key.description: Whether the extension should scan folder sizes automatically.

key.name: show-quick-settings
key.description: Whether to show the auto scan toggle in the GNOME Shell Quick Settings menu.
